name: Reactor (itch) (Birdwards)
description:
The discovery of a new chemical element, diracium, led researchers to a mad dash to be the first to use it for energy production in a nuclear reactor. Unfortunately, diracium is quite unstable, only lasting for a few moments before decaying...

This is a freeform match-3 puzzle game in which you control a cluster of atoms. The atoms in your cluster decay at random intervals by splitting into other atoms or disappearing entirely. For instructions, click "How to Play" in the main menu.

All code, graphics, music, and sound effects made by Birdwards in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49.
